name: SpecialsAgent
tag_list: drink-specials, food-specials, restaurant-specials, bar-specials, coupons, deals
overview:
SpecialsAgent is a free consumer search engine for food and drink specials at nearby bars and restaurants. Consumers can easily find great values on the SpecialsAgent website as well as mobile and social media sites. SpecialsAgent provides accurate, up-to-date specials that are conveniently searchable relative to a location.

Once a consumer puts in a location, SpecialsAgent delivers up to 100 restaurants and bars ranked by distance and day. A quick visual scan (or a keyword filter) and consumers know just where and when to save money. Convenient maps show just where the special is waiting and you can also check out customer reviews, photos, websites, hours of operation, etc.

Restaurant and bar managers can add their specials for free by going to [Business.SpecialsAgent]

milestones.source_description: Specials Ticker on SpecialsAgent Home Page

external_links.title: Free Tool for Restaurants and Bars to Manage their Specials
